title: Azhage Bhrammanidam Lyrics Devathaiyai Kanden
stanzas:
azhage bhrammanidam
1manu kodukka poirundhen
nee en manaiviyaaga
vaendum endru

aandu pala kaathirukka
vendum endru avan sonnaan
aayul varai kaathiruppen
endru naanu solli vanthen

enaasai niraiverumaa
en thozhi neeyum sollammaa
nadakkum nadakkum
naankooda solgiraen

unai naan sumappadhinaal
idhayamum karuvaithaan
manadhaal naanum annaiye
maraven endrum unnaiye

naan paalai vanathil vidhaipol
nee paruvam thandha mazhaipol
en kadhal sediyil poovum
pooththathe

unvizhi thirandhirunthaal
vidiyalae thaevayillai
unai naan thurandhirundhaal
uyir adhu sondhamillai

yaen indha piravi endru
idhuvarai ninaithirundhen
uyire unnai paarthadhum
ulagae pudhiyathaanadhe

enai padaitha andha dheivam
enai sumandha annai dheivam
ivai irandum unnthan kannil
parkkiren

paruvangal oadipogum
uruvangal maaripogum
unmeedhu konda kaadhal
uyiraiyum thaandi vaazhum

azhage bhrammanidam
manu kodukka poirundhen
nee en manaiviyaaga
vaendum endru

aandu pala kaathirukka
vendum endru avan sonnaan
aayul varai kaathiruppen
endru naanu solli vanthen

enaasai niraiverumaa
en thozhi neeyum sollammaa
nadakkum nadakkum
naankooda solgiraen
